page.title: 11CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content:
{THE W.I. The W.I.has about 30 members and meets 11 times a year.There is a small group who meet a week before each meeting.They are called the committee.When they meet they decide what is going to happen at the next meeting.Each meeting lasts for 3 hours including cake and coffee at the end when the ladies chat.The Whitbourne W.I.give flower posies to members on their birthday.
{THE MONDAY CLUB. The Monday Club meets on the second Monday of every month.It is basically for older people to get together for a cup of tea and a chat.They have interesting speakers and make visits to the theatre.Recent meetings have included speakers about the weather and old fashioned farm implements.
